name: magicmirror-3rd-party-modules
description: This project provides an overview of all MagicMirror² modules and puts the modules through a few tests.

scripts.all: npm run createModuleList && npm run getModules && npm run expandModuleList && npm run checkModules && npm run updateGitHubData
scripts.ownList: rm -rf modules & node create_own_module_list.js && npm run getModules && npm run expandModuleList && npm run checkModules

descriptions.all: Run all scripts (1 till 4) on all modules. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.createModuleList: Script 1: Convert the official module list from the wiki into a json file.
descriptions.getModules: Script 2: Get all modules with `git cone`. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.expandModuleList: Script 3: Extend the module list with information from the package.json. And get an image if one is available and the license is okay.
descriptions.checkModules: Script 4: Perform various checks on the modules.
descriptions.updateGitHubData: Script 5: Update the JSON file that collects the GitHub information of the modules.
descriptions.ownList: Test only defined modules. See README.
descriptions.lint: Check this repository for linter and formatting problems.
descriptions.lint:fix: Fix automatically fixable linter or formatting problems of this repository.
